name: Color By Color (Not complete version)
description:
This game is rounded by a BlackBlock, which name is... BlackBlock LOL. But as always, it won't be easy! BlackBlock's enemys will not let him escape from the house he's stuck...

Controls:

W A S D: Movement

E: Interact

R: Restart level

LMB: Shoot

Esc: Go to menu
